Build a Mobile Document Scanning and Capture App in HTML5
The article shares how to use the latest version of web TWAIN to build a mobile web document scanner
The article shares how to use the latest version of web TWAIN to build a mobile web document scanner
Dynamic Web TWAIN 16 has added some exciting features related to the mobile platform.
Dynamic Web TWAIN 16添加了一系列针对移动平台的新功能。
Dynamic Web TWAIN 16 has added some exciting features related to the mobile platform.
通过移动设备的摄像头捕获文档，16.0
Acquiring images from a remote scanner, 16.1
从远程扫描仪获取图像，16.1
Acquiring images from a remote scanner, 16.1
All of these make it possible to build a mobile document scanning and capture app in HTML5 with ease.
有了以上功能，我们可以很容易地构建一个移动端的HTML5文档扫描应用，
All of these make it possible to build a mobile document scanning and capture app in HTML5 with ease.
Such a mobile document scanner can not only utilize high-resolution cameras equipped on modern mobile devices but also interact with connected scanners.
不仅可以利用现代移动设备上配备的高分辨率摄像头，还可以远程调用扫描仪。
Such a mobile document scanner can not only utilize high-resolution cameras equipped on modern mobile devices but also interact with connected scanners.
Your phone can be the hub of the entire document scanning process.
这样通过手机就可以完成整个文档扫描过程。
Your phone can be the hub of the entire document scanning process.
If you don’t have a document scanner, you can install the virtual scanner app for tests on Windows.
如果手头没有扫描仪，可以在Windows上安装虚拟扫描仪应用进行测试。
If you don’t have a document scanner, you can install the virtual scanner app for tests on Windows.
Let's implement the scanner in steps.
Let's implement the scanner in steps.
Our goal is to build a web document scanner that mobile devices can use.
我们的目标是构建一个移动设备可以使用的文档扫描Web应用。
Our goal is to build a web document scanner that mobile devices can use.
布局要针对移动设备进行优化。

On the top is a viewer of scanned documents.
顶部是一个已扫描文档的查看器。
On the top is a viewer of scanned documents.
Below the viewer, there is an actions tab.
查看器下方是一个操作Tab选项卡。
Below the viewer, there is an actions tab.
Since there is not much screen space for mobile devices, using a tab is a good choice if there are many actions available.
由于移动设备的屏幕空间不多，操作很多的话，使用Tab选项卡是一个可行的选择。
Since there is not much screen space for mobile devices, using a tab is a good choice if there are many actions available.

我们首先做一个基础版本，支持用相机捕获图像并将结果保存到图像或PDF文件中。
Here, we first create a minimum version which captures images with the camera and save them to image or PDF files.

We use the <g1>Skeleton CSS framework</g1> and add the <g2>viewport</g2> meta to make the page responsive and suitable for mobile devices.
我们使用<g1>Skeleton CSS框架</g1>​​，并添加<g2>viewport</g2>元数据，以使页面支持响应式设计。
We use the <g1>Skeleton CSS framework</g1> and add the <g2>viewport</g2> meta to make the page responsive and suitable for mobile devices.
The tabs are created according to <g1>How To Create Tabs</g1>.
根据<g1>How To Create Tabs</g1>这篇文章创建Tab。
The tabs are created according to <g1>How To Create Tabs</g1>.
The tab's style is modified so that the tab is horizontally scrollable.
Tab的样式有做修改，可以水平滚动。
The tab's style is modified so that the tab is horizontally scrollable.
The camera addon is used to access mobile cameras which is through <g1>MediaDevices</g1>.
摄像头组件通过<g1>MediaDevices</g1>访问移动摄像头。
The camera addon is used to access mobile cameras which is through <g1>MediaDevices</g1>.
If you don't have an HTTPS server, you can create a local server using Python 3 following this <g2>post</g2>.
如果没有HTTPS服务器，可以根据这个<g2>帖子</g2>使用Python 3运行本地服务器。
If you don't have an HTTPS server, you can create a local server using Python 3 following this <g2>post</g2>.
You also need to copy the Resources folder from <g1>Dynamsoft\Dynamic Web TWAIN SDK <version>\Resources</g1> to the project's root directory.
另外还需要将Resources文件夹从<g1>Dynamsoft\Dynamic Web TWAIN SDK <version>\Resources</g1>复制到项目的根目录。
You also need to copy the Resources folder from <g1>Dynamsoft\Dynamic Web TWAIN SDK <version>\Resources</g1> to the project's root directory.
Now we can add new functions based on the minimum implementation.
我们可以给基础版本添加更多功能。
Now we can add new functions based on the minimum implementation.
Basically, there are three input sources: scanner, camera, local files.
Web TWAIN主要有三种输入来源：扫描仪、摄像头、本地文件。
Basically, there are three input sources: scanner, camera, local files.
Loading local files is very simple with the <g1>LoadImageEx</g1> method.
加载本地文件十分简单，调用<g1>LoadImageEx</g1>即可。
Loading local files is very simple with the <g1>LoadImageEx</g1> method.
It can load images as well as PDFs.
它可以加载图片以及PDF文件。
It can load images as well as PDFs.

Since mobiles devices normally cannot connect to scanners physically, we can only use the RemoteScan capability.
由于移动设备无法物理连接到扫描仪，因此我们只能使用远程扫描功能。
Since mobiles devices normally cannot connect to scanners physically, we can only use the RemoteScan capability.

<g1>How to Build a Universal Document Scanning App in HTML5</g1> explains how to do this in detail.

视图模式应该是可调整的。此外，我们还需要删除，重新排序和编辑图像。

Dynamic Web TWAIN provides rich APIs to do this.
我们可以用Dynamic Web TWAIN提供的丰富的API来做到这些。
Dynamic Web TWAIN provides rich APIs to do this.
It also has a powerful image editor which can adapt to mobile devices.
它还内置了一个移动设备友好的图像编辑器，
It also has a powerful image editor which can adapt to mobile devices.
Functions like rotation, deskewing, flipping, mirroring, cropping and cutting are supported.
支持旋转、倾斜、翻转、镜像、裁剪和剪切等功能。
Functions like rotation, deskewing, flipping, mirroring, cropping and cutting are supported.
